OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Patients stratify accord center , chemotherapy schedule ( concurrent platinum v concurrent cetuximab v neoadjuvant concurrent platinum v neoadjuvant docetaxel , platinum , fluorouracil concurrent platinum ) , T stage ( T1-T2 v T3-T4 ) , N stage ( N2a-N2b v N2c-N3 ) . Patients randomize 1 2 treatment arm . - Arm I : Patients receive standard concurrent chemoradiotherapy ( CRT ) . Patients undergo PET/CT scan 9-13 week completion CRT . Patients complete response primary site undergo neck dissection within 4 week . - Arm II : Patients undergo neck dissection receive standard CRT . Patients undergo PET/CT scan 9-13 week completion CRT . Patients assess periodically quality-of-life . Tissue blood sample collect periodically stored future research . After completion study treatment , patient follow monthly 1 year bimonthly 1 year .
